channel.title: SES:HKL on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in SES:HKL on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hongkong Land Sees Office Market Recovery With More Demand
item.description: Hongkong Land Holdings Ltd., the biggest commercial landlord in Hong Kong’s financial district, is seeing a recovery in the city’s ailing office market.
